alliances: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
description: Paragon is the codename used by three unrelated fictional characters from Marvel Comics. The first was genetically engineered by the Enclave. The second was created as an original character for the video game Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects. The third is a superhero and a member of Nebraska's Initiative team.
name: Paragon
powers: invulnerability due to the ability to control his density
Retractable blades capable of draining organic life-force
